Text: Ok, so this appears to be written BY and FOR 5yr-olds who like pretty colors and HULK SMASH... I mean Its Clobbering Time... I mean...I AM OMAC!!!
Nice! You and GunningHawk are knocking them out of the park! Any chance we might get a fixed upload for Batgirl? The first one was missing a page.
if it was missing a page then I dont think we missed any crucial details, but Im sure there will be another upload later

Fair enough. I think we just missed the introduction of the new roommate character. 

Either way, you guys are awesome for these uploads. And you're right, I would have loved O.M.A.C. 18 years ago.
